about_the_game:
Puzzle Planet offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and world exploration, perfect for solo players and groups of friends. This game invites players to embark on a virtual world tour, piecing together jigsaw puzzles that feature stunning real-world locations from every corner of the globe.

Key Features:

World Tour Mode: Design your own global journey, selecting destinations across continents.

Multiplayer Expeditions: Team up with friends online to tackle puzzles together. Share the excitement of exploring new destinations and solving puzzles as a group.

Customizable Difficulty: Choose from various difficulty levels, adjusting the number of puzzle pieces (from 50 to 1000) to suit your skill level and preference.

Interactive Map: Navigate a beautifully rendered world map to select your next puzzle destination. The map tracks your progress and highlights new locations as you complete puzzles.

Educational Insights: Learn interesting facts and history about each location you visit. A great feature for players who love to learn about different cultures and places.
